name: Goa Beach Escape
description: Relax on sandy beaches, enjoy vibrant nightlife, and explore the Portuguese heritage of Goa.

name: Manali Adventure
description: Experience trekking, camping, and river rafting in the Himalayas. Perfect for thrill-seekers.

name: Kerala Backwaters
description: Cruise on houseboats, enjoy authentic Kerala cuisine, and explore the serene backwaters.

name: Leh-Ladakh Bike Trip
description: Ride through rugged terrains, mountain passes, and witness breathtaking landscapes.

name: Golden Triangle Tour
description: Discover India's history and culture by visiting the Taj Mahal, Jaipur forts, and Delhi landmarks.

name: Andaman Islands Getaway
description: Scuba dive, snorkel, and enjoy pristine beaches in the Andaman & Nicobar Islands.

name: Rajasthan Desert Safari
description: Camel safari, desert camping, and folk dance in the golden sands of Jaisalmer.

name: Sikkim & Darjeeling Escape
description: Tea gardens, monasteries, and Himalayan views await you in Sikkim & Darjeeling.

name: Maldives Luxury Stay
description: Overwater villas, crystal-clear waters, and luxury resorts in the Maldives.

name: Swiss Alps Adventure
description: Skiing, snowboarding, and scenic train rides through the Swiss Alps.

name: Bali Spiritual Retreat
description: Yoga, meditation, and cultural experiences in Baliâ€™s serene environment.

name: Dubai Shopping Festival
description: Shop luxury brands, visit Burj Khalifa, and enjoy desert safaris.
